T02D2823:171b-0: @171b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2823:171b-1: mthu chen gdug pa klu yi nad //
T02D2823:171b-2: myur du bde blag gso byed pa //
T02D2823:171b-3: spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun //
T02D2823:171b-4: snying rje ldan pa rnams kyis bsgrub //
T02D2823:171b-5: de la mi gang zhig sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'am /
T02D2823:171b-6: glo bur gyi rkyen gang gi stobs kyis lus sam
T02D2823:171b-7: sems la nye bar gnod pa'i mtshan ma 'ga' zhig
T02D2823:171b-8: mthong na de'i sgrib pa bsal bar bya ba'i don
T02D2823:171b-9: du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun
T02D2823:171b-10: gyi cho ga 'di la rab tu brtson par bya'o
T02D2823:171b-16: mtsher ba dang zho sha la sogs pa dang /
T02D2823:172a-2: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D2823:172a-3: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2823:172a-4: 'bras yos dang snum khur la sogs pa ji snyed 'byor pa'i yo byad bsham par bya'o //
T02D2823:172a-5: mdor na klu gso ba'i cho ga rnams las ji snyed bshad pa thams cad do //
T02D2823:172a-6: klu skyob mgon po dkar bzang zhi ba zhal mnga' ba //
T02D2823:172a-7: spyan gsum brtse ba'i mche bas rab bskyod smin ma g-yo //
T02D2823:172a-8: ltos 'gro rgyal po phu:yis 'gram gong mgo rgyan can //
T02D2823:172a-9: ba spu re re 'ang bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i khur khyer ba'o //
T02D2823:172a-10: g-yas phyag mchog sbyin thal mo padmo mdzes bcug kha phye glang chen sna 'dra'i sor mo bkram //
T02D2823:172a-11: ming med rtse nas klu rnams rab dga' sman mchog ro brgya phan mdzad nyid kyi sa bon can //
T02D2823:172a-12: rab tu dang zhing g-yo ba'i 'od 'dzag dri ngad phyogs bcur ldang ba'i thigs pa bdun brtsegs 'bab //
T02D2823:172a-13: phyag mthil aa las ye shes 'od 'phros dbyangs dang gsal byed bdud rtsi yig 'bru rnam bcus brgyan //
T02D2823:172a-14: aom a'a:hr'i:mam n'a ga bo sh'a h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2823:172a-15: zla ba la ni skar ma bzhin //
T02D2823:172a-17: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar //
T02D2823:172a-18: snang ba dri med bsgom par bya //
T02D2823:172a-19: byams pa'i gzhu bkang snying rje yi //
T02D2823:172a-20: mda' bzung gsang sngags bde bsnun pas //
T02D2823:172a-21: rdzas rnams dri ma gzhom pa dang //
T02D2823:172a-22: byin gyis brlab pa mchog tu bya //
T02D2823:172a-23: bdud rtsi thigs pa bdun pa las //
T02D2823:172a-24: padma'i rtsa ba'i skud pa ltar //
T02D2823:172a-25: phra zhing grims pa'i rgyun phab la //
T02D2823:172a-26: mchod rdzas rnam dag rgya mtshor bskyed //
T02D2823:172a-27: phyag mthil aa las zar spros pas //
T02D2823:172a-28: gdug pa de dag spyan drang ngo //
T02D2823:172a-29: aom n'a ga sa pa ri w'a ra sa ma ya h'um dza:dza:/
T02D2823:172a-30: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni //
T02D2823:172a-31: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2823:172a-32: mtsho chen rab dang dpag med rin chen chal par bkram pa'i nang //
T02D2823:172a-33: khang bzangs mang brtsegs klu tshogs sna tshogs zhi bas gnas pa dang //
T02D2823:172a-34: gtum pa'i tshul can longs spyod rgya cher 'byor pa la sogs dang //
T02D2823:172a-35: de bzhin sa dang rir gnas rtse shing rten sogs ma lus blta //
T02D2823:172a-36: thams cad lce la thub pa yi //
T02D2823:172a-38: 'od kyi sbu gu dam pa dag / re re las kyang skar mda' bzhin //
T02D2823:172a-39: de nas sbyin pa'i sngags 'di dag / brjod pas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag dang //
T02D2823:172a-40: bcas te klu rnams tshim par bya //
T02D2823:172a-41: snying rje chen po dam tshig yin //
T02D2823:172a-42: aom a'a:hr'i:mah'ak'a ru na shr'i lo ka n'a tha sarba
T02D2823:172b-0: n'a ge stva yis tyee @172b ma h'a sa tyee
T02D2823:172b-1: aa dhishtha nee sarba lo k'a sarba na g'a do
T02D2823:172b-2: sha pra ha na ha na ha na h'um phat
T02D2823:172b-3: / bosh'a pra tyuta po sha aa tyanta pra ti pra dyuta po sha sv'ah'a /
T02D2823:172b-4: tshad med bdud rtsi'i thig le bzhis //
T02D2823:172b-5: nyer btsas 'phags pa nyid bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2823:172b-6: khu ba'i chu rgyun dag pas kyang //
T02D2823:172b-7: klu rnams lan mang bkru bar bya //
T02D2823:172b-8: byad ma dag gis rig sngags bzhin //
T02D2823:172b-9: de dag gnod pas sos gyur na //
T02D2823:172b-10: bdag gi gang gang gnod yod pa //
T02D2823:172b-11: de yang ring por mi thogs 'dzad //
